metadata.name: King Kunta
metadata.description:
Friendship is rare. In your life, mint as many 1:1, genuine, nonfungible friends as possible. Nurture those relationships. 

NonFun Friends is a generative art PFP collection of 9,006 NFTs released over 3 generations on the Ethereum blockchain with IRL, in-game, and DAO governance utilities. 

Governance utility gives one vote per Friend-holding wallet to the DAO that oversees the $NONFUN ecosystem. 

In-real-life utility is based  upon personality types of the Friends and includes exclusive registration privileges for live and virtual events. 

In-game utility includes access to exclusive voxel mints for the Sandbox and access to future metaverse-based experiences. 

Community rewards include increased access to $NONFUN token-earning opportunities. 

NonFun exists for YOU. Let's build something awesome together, Friends.
